Package socialmedia

package socialmedia
  • Class
    Description
    Account
    Account class Attributes: static counter - used to count the IDs to ensure they are unique ID - unique int for each Account (starts from 0) handle - unique account handle desc - account description
    AccountIDNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use an account ID that does not exit in the system.
    BadMiniSocialMedia
    BadMiniSocialMedia is a minimally compiling, but non-functioning implementor of the MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
    BadSocialMedia
    BadSocialMedia is a minimally compiling, but non-functioning implementor of the SocialMediaPlatform interface.
    Comment
    Comment inherits from Post Has additional attribute: referenceID - the ID of the post that the comment is referencing
    Endorsement
    Endorsement inherits from Post Has additional attribute: referenceID - the ID of the post that the endorsement is referencing
    HandleNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use an account handle that does not exit in the system.
    IllegalHandleException
    Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle already in use in the system.
    InvalidHandleException
    Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle empty or having more than the system limit of characters.
    InvalidPostException
    Thrown when attempting to create a post which the message is empty or has more characters than the system's limit.
    MiniSocialMediaPlatform
    MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
    NotActionablePostException
    Thrown when attempting to act upon an not-actionable post.
    Post
    Post class Attributes: static counter - used to count the IDs to ensure they are unique ID - unique int for each Post (starts from 0) message - must be no more than 100chars authorID - ID of the account that the post is associated with
    PostIDNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use a post ID that does not exit in the system.
    SocialMedia
    An implementor of the SocialMediaPlatform interface
    SocialMediaPlatform
    SocialMediaPlatform interface.
